metadata.name: Artistic nostalgia B & W #1/10
metadata.description:
Imagine if this was my last painting, my last poem, my last shot.  
I will be devastated, remembering only the times of happiness when creating, dreaming and inventing.

Acrylic on canvas, using physical elements in a second process and digital in procreate in the final process.

Finally using overhead photography technique to create the NFT.

10 Editions 
B/W Giveaway to Manifold Collectors
